archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: James J. Kilpatrick Papers, 1963-1977, Accession #6626-g, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Library acquired these papers from James J. Kilpatrick on 3 May 1977.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains reader mail, 1975-1977; speeches and related research and correspondence; manuscripts for his syndicated column, 1976 January to June; a 1974 interview with President Nixon regarding the Watergate scandal; articles, chiefly for National Reviewand related correspondence; research files particularly on Nixon, Watergate and the 1968 Democratic Convention; an appointment calendar and an account book.
